import urllib.request
import json

COM_CODE = ''627250''
USER_ID = ''KIMHI1983''

PASSWORD = ''kak830912!''

test_url = ''http://sboapi.ecount.com/ECERP/OAPI/Login''

payload = {
    ''COM_CODE'': COM_CODE,
    ''USER_ID'': USER_ID,
    ''API_KEY'': API_KEY,
    ''LAN_TYPE'': ''ko-KR'',
    ''ZONE_NODES'': '''',
    ''PASSWORD'': PASSWORD
}

try:
    data = json.dumps\(payload\).encode\(''utf-8''\)
    req = urllib.request.Request\(test_url, data=data, headers={''Content-Type'': ''application/json''}\)
    with urllib.request.urlopen\(req, timeout=15\) as resp:
        result = json.loads\(resp.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8''\)\)
        print\(''Response:'', json.dumps\(result, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False\)\)
        if str\(result.get\(''Status''\)\) == ''200'':
            print\(\)
            print\(''*** 검증 성공! 이제 이카운트 ERP [API인증현황] 메뉴를 새로고침 해보세요. ***''\)
        else:
            print\(\)
            print\(f''실패 사유: {result.get\(""Error""\) or result.get\(""Errors""\)}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''연결 오류: {e}''\)
")
